jollyRoger: A skull with a pirate hat and pink hair resembling Big Mom

keyMoments.title: Big Mom Pirates Representatives Arrive
keyMoments.description: Pekoms and Tamago arrive at Fish-Man Island as representatives of the Big Mom Pirates to collect the monthly candy tribute.
keyMoments.significance: First physical appearance of Big Mom Pirates members and establishment of Big Mom's protection business model.

keyMoments.title: Candy Tribute Demand
keyMoments.description: The Big Mom Pirates demand the monthly candy payment from Fish-Man Island, setting up conflict when the factory has been destroyed.
keyMoments.significance: Initiates the conflict that leads to Luffy declaring war on Big Mom.

formation.circumstances: Formed by Charlotte Linlin (Big Mom) in the New World

notableAchievements: One of the Four Emperor crews ruling the New World
Control over Totto Land and numerous territories

jollyRoger: A skull with three skulls and crossed bones

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Confirmed as Yonko
keyMoments.description: Jinbe reveals that the Blackbeard Pirates conquered Whitebeard's former territories and Marshall D. Teach claimed the position of Yonko.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Blackbeard Pirates as one of the most powerful crews in the world and confirms Blackbeard's rise to Emperor status.

formation.circumstances: Formed by Marshall D. Teach after leaving the Whitebeard Pirates

goals: Conquer territories in the New World
notableAchievements: Defeated Marco and the Whitebeard Pirates remnants
